name: Aquarius BHA + Blue Tansy Clarifying Cleanser
about: What it is:A BHA gel cleanser that thoroughly cleans pores and gently exfoliates oily and combination skin prone to breakouts..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Willow Bark BHA: Is a natural form of salicylic acid that clears clogged pores..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Formulated specifically for oily and blemish-prone skin and powered by BHA, blue tansy, and zincu2014a power trio for targeting oil and visibly minimizing poresu2014this cleanser removes makeup without stripping your skin of moisture.
ingredients: -Willow Bark BHA: Is a natural form of salicylic acid that clears clogged pores..-Blue Tansy Oil: Contains azulene, which visibly soothes redness and balances oil..-Zinc PCA: Absorbs oil and defends skin from blemish-causing bacteria...Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Methyl Oleoyl Taurate, Lauryl Glucoside, Coco-Glucoside, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Tanacetum Annuum Flower Oil, Zinc PCA, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Menthyl Lactate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Lactobacillus Ferment, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Betaine, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Dispense one to two pumps into wet palms..-Add water and lather..-Massage onto wet skin for 30 to 60 seconds..-Rinse off and pat dry...To remove makeup:.-Apply one to two pumps directly to dry skin. .-Rinse thoroughly with water until clean. ..Recycling Instructions:.-Place outer carton into paper recycling. .-Remove label, rinse glass bottle thoroughly, and recycle..-Unfortunately, pumps cannot be recycled at this time due to their many mixed parts. That's why Herbivore is moving to pumps that contain post-consumer recycled materials. Please dispose of them properly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Where to start? I'm 40 years old and I would say I have fairly combination skin. I don't have any major skin problems but I have always had difficulty getting rid of closed comedones (whiteheads) at the corner of my mouth under the lower lip and on my chin. I also often have pimples on my chin during PMS. It's been a little over a month since I started using this cleanser and I'm not sure of the results at all. Initially, I found it to be a good cleanser, nothing really more, but I found that it dried my skin a little too much so I use the Drunk Elephant facial moisturizer every 2-3 days to help with this. A week ago, I started having red pimples on the cheeks, on the chin and even under one eye. I have no idea if it's due to some sort of normal purging of the skin from this cleanser that contains active ingredients or if it's just the product that doesn't suit my skin well. I read that usually a purge lasts between 4 to 8 weeks, so I was thinking of continuing it hoping that it will get better with time but at the same time, I'm afraid that it will get worse... I so wish I could have said that I finally found THE cleanser but at this stage, I am not at all convinced.

reviews.review_title: Herbivore Aquarius Blue Tansy Clarifying Cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Herbivore Botanicals gifted this Aquarius Blue Tansy Clarifying Cleanser in exchange for my honest review. I was just thrilled to try Herbivore's Aquarius Blue Tansy Clarifying Cleanser for the first time! I've been wanting to try it for a while now so I just could not contain my excitement! Despite me not being a huge fan of its fairly potent powerful fragrance, it is incredibly gentle on my already sensitive skin and the blue color makes it a unique product and something fun to use.  The gel-like texture is light and lathers nicely. After just one use, I could feel my skin much more soft, smooth, and silky. It eliminated flaky dry skin patches which are a major problem for me, and fulfilled hydration levels quickly leaving bright, healthy, rejuvenated skin, which is nothing unusual for Herbivore Botanicals!

reviews.review_text: best cleanser I've used in a few years. i  used to be a fan of the Clinique All About Clean facial cleanser until it stopped working for me. since then, I had tried a few different brands, but I was still experiencing moderate breakouts and clogged pores. I came across this product while perusing the sephora site, and liked that it was described as a cleanser. and cleanse it does! I've been using it about a month now and have noticed that I no longer feel bumps deep beneath my skin. which is unusual for me because I ALWAYS had bumps under my skin which would eventually become cystic, scarring acne bumps. the scent is also very pleasant. I use this day and night. I follow up with the face oil (which I also love!) in the mornings.

reviews.review_title: It does what it says it will do!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a week of using it every day, morning and night, majority of my acne has cleared up and my skin has been feeling soft and smooth! I give myself two pumps of it into the palm of my hand, rub it together until it foams up, and I lather that all over my face. This is the second cleanser I use after I use an oil cleanser to remove my makeup. It doesn't strip my skin and I feel quite squeaky clean afterwards! For reference, I have combination and sensitive skin.   Not related to the cleanser, I love the technical part of the pump. If you twist it to the left, it locks the pump so that it doesn't spill when you travel. Plus, I think it's at a great price point that actually does support with targeted concerns.

reviews.review_text: Do not buy this if you have even slightly sensitive skin, it is extremely irritating and always causes my face to become red puffy. What's even more impressive is that my 13-year-old daughter has been using this product to combat her acne, and it's been working wonders for her. She's been struggling with breakouts for a while now, but after using this cleanser for a few weeks, her skin has cleared up significantly.  Overall, I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a gentle yet effective facial cleanser. It's perfect for those with dry skin, and it's also great for teens struggling with acne. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Herbavoir, Herbivore Aquarius Clarity Facial Cleanser is an effective, natural cleanser from Herbivore Botanicals. It is formulated to remove impurities and balance combination to oily skin. The Aquarius Clarity Cleanser is rich in vitamin C and features a unique blend of lemon and ginger to help tone and purify the skin. It is free from artificial fragrances and is suited for all skin types. The Aquarius Clarity Facial Cleanser is formulated with cold-pressed lemon, a natural exfoliant, that helps to gently remove dirt, excess oil and makeup without stripping the skin of moisture. Ginger, a natural astringent, helps to reduce inflammation, boost circulation and soothe skin. Witch hazel provides extra cleansing benefits and helps to tone and clarify the complexion. I find that the Aquarius Clarity Facial Cleanser is gentle enough to use every day and it has a pleasant, refreshing aroma that awakens the senses. It is lightweight and leaves the skin feeling clean but not dry or tight. My face feels smoother, brighter and more balanced after using this cleanser. It is also great for removing makeup and can also be used as a second cleanser step. Overall, I think the Herbivore Aquarius Clarity Facial Cleanser is an excellent natural cleanser and I would highly recommend it to people with combination to oily skin. It effectively cleanses, tones and helps to balance the skin without a drying effect. I definitely plan on keeping this product in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash!! My skin is sensitive so I always worry that certain BHA products will irritate yet this has been nothing but amazing! The cleanser is gentle enough and can be used multiple times a week. I try to use it every other day or every two days. My winter skin is a  little on the dry side so every two days is more appropriate for me during this time of year, but as I transition into the spring/summer i will probably move to using more often. I feel like itu2019s definitely smoothing and targets dullness. The packaging is big and definitely worth the price point.
